mods.abstract: $50 Reward. RUNAWAY, from the plantation of the undersigned, on Bayou BÅ“uf, 12 miles above Washington, in the Parish of St. Landy, a Mulatto-man named VALERE, aged about 30 years, about 5 feet 9 inches high ; the boy speaks English well and understands a little French. The above remard will be given for his delivery, will be given for his delivery, or his lodgment in jail where I can get him. ISAAC F LITTELL. St. Landry, October 6th 1860. N. B.-- The Marksville Pelican will please copy 4 times and send bill to this Office.
